input.oldString: description: 'VisibleDx is an evidence-based educational tool for ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS. It implements validated criteria from leading medical organizations to educate healthcare professionals in systematic evaluation.',
input.newString: description: 'VisibleDx is an open-source educational training tool for learning about ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS criteria. Designed exclusively for healthcare education, training, and research purposes - NOT for patient care or medical use.',
